args:
Determine whether this NHTSA investigation summary is relevant to the Washington Post. Return `{result": true}` or `{"result": false}`
content: Seat Belt May Fail to Retract or Extend

Ford Motor Company (Ford) is recalling certain 2018-2020 Expedition and Lincoln Navigator vehicles.  The seat belt pretensioner in the driver and/or front passenger seat may inadvertently lock the seat belt, which will not allow the belt to retract or extend.Seat belts that do not retract or extend can fail to restrain an occupant as intended, increasing the risk of injury in a crash.

Number of Units Affected: 105322.0"
